name: Prüfer Sequence

complexity.construction: O(n log n) with heap, O(n) linear method
complexity.reconstruction: O(n log n) with heap, O(n) linear method

scenarios: Counting spanning trees in complete graphs
Counting ways to connect components in a graph
extensions: Cayley's formula: number of labeled trees on n nodes is n^(n-2)
Generalization to disconnected graphs: counting ways to add k-1 edges to connect k components
